## Ordinate *Symbiodinium* communities
```{r echo=FALSE}

ord.phy97.f.c.coral <- ordinate(phy97.f.c.coral,method="PCoA",distance="wunifrac")
plot_ordination(phy97.f.c.coral, ord.phy97.f.c.coral,  color="Status", title="97% within-sample OTUs - PCoA") 



ord.phy97.f.c.platy <- ordinate(phy97.f.c.platy,method="PCoA",distance="wunifrac")
plot_ordination(phy97.f.c.platy, ord.phy97.f.c.platy, color="Year", shape="Status",
                title="97% within-sample OTUs - PCoA - Platy only")

ord.phy97.f.c.coral.2016March <- ordinate(phy97.f.c.coral.2016March,method="CAP",distance="wunifrac",formula= ~ Site)
plot_ordination(phy97.f.c.coral.2016March, ord.phy97.f.c.coral.2016March, color="Coral_Species", shape="Dist", title="97% within-sample OTUs - PCoA")


ord.phy97.f.c.platy.CAP <- ordinate(phy97.f.c.platy,method="CAP",distance="wunifrac",formula= ~ Year + Site)
plot_ordination(phy97.f.c.platy, ord.phy97.f.c.platy.CAP,  shape="Status",type="scree",
                title="97% within-sample OTUs - CAP Platygyra only")


anova(ord.phy97.f.c.platy.CAP)

finalmodel.platy <- ordistep(ord.phy97.f.c.platy.CAP, formula= ~ Year + Site, direction = c("both"), Pin = 0.05, Pout = 0.1, pstep = 100, perm.max = 1000, steps = 50, trace = TRUE)

finalmodel.2016March <- ordistep(ord.phy97.f.c.coral.2016March, formula= ~ Site, direction = c("both"), Pin = 0.05, Pout = 0.1, pstep = 100, perm.max = 1000, steps = 50, trace = TRUE)

finalmodel.2016March
finalmodel.platy

vif.cca(finalmodel.platy)

anova.cca(finalmodel.platy)
anova.cca(finalmodel.platy, by="terms")
anova.cca(finalmodel.platy, by="axis")



```
